In the experiment, superoxide anions were generated in 1 ml of nitrotetrazolium blue chloride (NBT) (2.52 mM), 1 ml of NADH (624 mM), and 1 ml of different sample concentrations. The reaction was initiated by adding 1 ml of phenazine methosulfate (PMS) solution (120 µM) to the reaction mixture.
